1: מִזְמ֗וֹר <sup>4210 </sup> <n>A Psalm</n> לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>of David</n> יְ֭הֹוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>LORD</n> מִי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>who</n> יָג֣וּר <sup>1481 </sup> <n>who shall abide</n> בְּאָהֳלֶ֑ךָ <sup>168 </sup> <n>tent</n> מִֽי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>who</n> יִ֝שְׁכֹּ֗ן <sup>7931 </sup> <n>may dwell</n> בְּהַ֣ר <sup>2022 </sup> <n>hill</n> קָדְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>in thy holy</n>
2: הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>He that walketh</n> תָּ֭מִים <sup>8549 </sup> <n>uprightly</n> וּפֹעֵ֥ל <sup>6466 </sup> <n>and worketh</n> צֶ֑דֶק <sup>6664 </sup> <n>righteousness</n> וְדֹבֵ֥ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>and speaketh</n> אֱ֝מֶ֗ת <sup>571 </sup> <n>the truth</n> בִּלְבָבֽוֹ׃ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>in his heart</n>
3: לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> רָגַ֨ל ׀ <sup>7270 </sup> <n>[He that] backbiteth</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> לְשֹׁנ֗וֹ <sup>3956 </sup> <n>not with his tongue</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> עָשָׂ֣ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>nor doeth</n> לְרֵעֵ֣הוּ <sup>7453 </sup> <n>to his neighbour</n> רָעָ֑ה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>evil</n> וְ֝חֶרְפָּ֗ה <sup>2781 </sup> <n>a reproach</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> נָשָׂ֥א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>nor taketh up</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> קְרֹֽבוֹ׃ <sup>7138 </sup> <n>against his neighbour</n>
4: נִבְזֶ֤ה ׀ <sup>959 </sup> <n>is contemned</n> בְּֽעֵ֘ינָ֤יו <sup>5869 </sup> <n>In whose eyes</n> נִמְאָ֗ס <sup>3988 </sup> <n>a vile person</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יִרְאֵ֣י <sup>3373 </sup> <n>them that fear</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> יְכַבֵּ֑ד <sup>3513 </sup> <n>but he honoureth</n> נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <sup>7650 </sup> <n>[He that] sweareth</n> לְ֝הָרַ֗ע <sup>7489 </sup> <n>to [his own] hurt</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and does not</n> יָמִֽר׃ <sup>4171 </sup> <n>and changeth</n>
5: כַּסְפּ֤וֹ ׀ <sup>3701 </sup> <n>his money</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> נָתַ֣ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>[He that] putteth not out</n> בְּנֶשֶׁךְ֮ <sup>5392 </sup> <n>to usury</n> וְשֹׁ֥חַד <sup>7810 </sup> <n>reward</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> נָקִ֗י <sup>5355 </sup> <n>against the innocent</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> לָ֫קָ֥ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>nor taketh</n> עֹֽשֵׂה־ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>He that doeth</n> אֵ֑לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> לֹ֖א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> יִמּ֣וֹט <sup>4131 </sup> <n>be moved</n> לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>these [things] shall never</n>
